alert.note: Alert for Garfield; Iron; Kane; Piute; Sevier (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 04 at 11:33AM MDT until May 06 at 5:56PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...Observed flooding changed from Minor to Moderate severity and increased in duration for the following rivers in Utah... Sevier River Near Hatch affecting Iron, Kane, Piute, Garfield and Sevier Counties. .Warm temperatures will melt snowpack and increase river flows. For the Sevier River...including Hatch...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL SATURDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Sevier River Near Hatch. * WHEN...Until Saturday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 4.3 feet, moderate flooding will affect fields, roads and bridges along low lying stretches of the Sevier River. Additionally, structures in low lying areas will receive flood damage. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:15 AM MDT Thursday the stage was 4.3 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 10:15 AM MDT Thursday was 4.4 feet. - Forecast...The river will oscillate around and just below moderate flood stage through Friday morning before gradually falling through Saturday morning, with a maximum value of 4.3 feet forecast this afternoon. - Flood stage is 3.9 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 4.4 feet on 06/02/1983. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Friday afternoon at 1200 PM MDT.
